description:
From stability and performance enhancements to bug fixes and new functionalities, we've got you covered. Join us as we explore the exciting updates, including fixes for rare crashes, optimized texture memory usage, and improvements to the fuel system and glass cockpits. We'll also take a closer look at the new career mode missions, agricultural aviation updates, and medevac missions. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight simulation community, this update brings a host of improvements that will enhance your virtual flying experience.
